creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: tan strip 5" with rust and magenta embroidery horizontally across top; three silk felt strips approx. 8", blue and red, bordered in black have satin stitch flora and fauna embroidered with gold thread stems; twelve are cut out appliques with silk tassels all in pastel colors; most have three tassels but several are missing; center red felt section has fanciful embroidery of two happy dragons facing each other; top two felt sections decorated with silk embroidered tape; partially lined in black
title: Wedding Banner (?)
